entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 15 except 11 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 15 except 11 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
